description: This file defines the MainViewModel class, managing a list of notes with category filtering, and a ViewModel factory. It interacts with a NoteRepository to fetch and delete notes, exposing LiveData for UI components to observe.

classes.name: MainViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel for managing notes and category filtering in the UI.

classes.name: MainViewModelFactory
classes.description: Factory class for creating instances of MainViewModel.

methods.name: setCategory
methods.description: Sets the current category filter, updating the notes list accordingly.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID asynchronously within the ViewModel's coroutine scope.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new instance of MainViewModel, ensuring correct class type.
